attributes.action: The uk government must make it illegal to kill any healthy living creature.
attributes.additional_details: Animals of all shapes and sizes from cows to sheep to foxes and badgers and rats and mice and all the other living creatures have a right to live out their lives in a safe and peaceful way. The uk government must pass laws that give protection to all animals and creatures in britain so that they can not be killed by people and they are entitled to live out their lives. It's time the uk government acted and showed the world that animals lives are important and lead the way in protecting animals.
attributes.background: Animals are living feeling creatures that have a right to live out their natural lives and they should be protected by uk law so that they can not be killed by people. The uk government must act to pass laws which will give animals the right to live out their lives.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Sir Mike Penning MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Hemel Hempstead
